gamedesc: Combine numbered tiles on a 4x4 grid to reach 2048! Swipe to merge matching tiles in this addictive puzzle game with simple controls and endless replayability.

name: Awesome Planes
gamedesc: Pilot powerful warplanes through intense aerial dogfights! Shoot down enemies, dodge fire, and upgrade your weapons in explosive sky combat.

name: Awesome Tanks
gamedesc: Command your tank through enemy-filled battlefields! Destroy rivals, upgrade armor and weapons, and become an unstoppable force in tactical tank warfare.

name: Sandboxels
gamedesc: Experiment with hundreds of elements in this creative physics sandbox! Mix fire, water, plants, acids, and more to create chain reactions and simulations.

name: Bloons TD 4
gamedesc: Pop colorful balloons with strategic monkey tower placement! Upgrade defenses and use tactical thinking to conquer waves of bloons.

name: Bitlife
gamedesc: Live a complete virtual life from birth to death! Make choices that shape your character's destiny in this interactive life simulator.

name: Blackjack
gamedesc: Play the classic casino card game! Get as close to 21 as possible without going over. Hit, stand, double down, or split!

name: Bloons TD 5
gamedesc: The ultimate balloon-popping tower defense! More towers, upgrades, and special abilities than ever before in this series masterpiece.

name: Line Rider 2
gamedesc: Draw custom tracks and watch a sledder ride your creation! Create simple paths or elaborate masterpieces with physics-based action.

name: Bob The Robber
gamedesc: Become the ultimate burglar! Sneak past cameras and guards, crack safes, and steal loot in this charming stealth puzzle game.

name: Click The Wawas
gamedesc: Click to earn points and unlock upgrades! Purchase auto-clickers and multipliers in this addictive incremental game.

name: Cookie Clicker
gamedesc: Bake infinite cookies! Buy grandmas, farms, and factories to automate your cookie empire. Unlock achievements and secret upgrades!

name: Doom
gamedesc: The legendary FPS that revolutionized gaming! Battle hellish demons on Mars with powerful weapons in fast-paced action.

name: Drive Mad
gamedesc: Navigate obstacle courses in this physics-based driving challenge! Balance your vehicle carefully to avoid flips and reach the finish.

name: Duck Life 4
gamedesc: Train your duck to become a champion racer! Improve abilities through mini-games, compete in races, and explore new areas.

name: Eggy Car
gamedesc: Drive with a fragile egg! Navigate hills without letting it fall or crack. Perfect balance between speed and caution required!

name: Block Blast
gamedesc: Clear blocks and create explosive combos! Place blocks strategically to form lines and set up massive chain reactions.

name: Basket Random
gamedesc: Wacky basketball with ragdoll physics! One-button controls in constantly changing environments. Perfect for quick matches!

name: Cursed Treasure 1
gamedesc: Defend cursed gems from heroes! Build crypts, demon dens, and orc towers to create an impenetrable evil fortress.

name: Cursed Treasure 2
gamedesc: Enhanced evil empire defense! Improved graphics, new towers, and deeper strategy. Evil triumphs again!

name: Crossing the Pit
gamedesc: Navigate a treacherous pit filled with deadly obstacles! Choose your path wisely and time movements perfectly.

name: Breaking The Bank
gamedesc: Henry Stickmin's first heist! Choose methods to break into the bank, each leading to hilarious outcomes.

name: Bubble Tanks TD 1
gamedesc: Defend against bubble enemies! Build and upgrade bubble-powered towers in this unique minimalist tower defense.

name: Bubble Tanks TD 2
gamedesc: More bubble battles with advanced towers and tougher enemies! Enhanced graphics and deeper mechanics.

name: Bubble Tanks TD Arena
gamedesc: Control your own bubble tank! Battle enemies, grow larger, and customize with weapons in arena combat.

name: Gun Mayham 2
gamedesc: Chaotic platform battles! Fight AI or friends with various weapons in destructible environments.

name: Gun Mayham Redux
gamedesc: Enhanced Gun Mayham with improved graphics! Campaign missions and multiplayer with updated mechanics.

name: Happy Wheels
gamedesc: Hilariously brutal physics platformer! Navigate deadly obstacle courses with realistic ragdoll physics and dark comedy.

name: Idle Mining Empire
gamedesc: Build a mining empire! Dig resources, hire miners, upgrade equipment, and watch profits grow even when offline.

name: Among Us Online
gamedesc: Fan-made Among Us! Complete tasks as crewmate or deceive as impostor. Social deduction at its finest!

name: Among Us Online Sever 2
gamedesc: Alternative Among Us server! Same thrilling gameplay with different connectivity options.

name: Iron Snout
gamedesc: Kung-fu fighting pig vs wolves! Use acrobatic moves and quick reflexes. Simple controls, deep combos!

name: Jelly Truck
gamedesc: Drive a wobbly jelly truck! Navigate squishy physics-based obstacles and bounce to the finish line.

name: Kingdom Rush
gamedesc: Legendary tower defense! Build towers, command heroes, and use abilities to defend your kingdom with deep strategy.

name: Learn to Fly 2
gamedesc: Help a penguin achieve flight! Glide, bounce, collect coins, and purchase upgrades to fly further.

name: Learn to Fly 3
gamedesc: Ultimate penguin flight! Build custom machines, unlock parts, and explore story mode with endless possibilities.

name: Motherload
gamedesc: Dig deep into Mars for minerals! Upgrade your pod, manage fuel, and discover underground secrets.

name: MotoX2M 2
gamedesc: Motorcycle stunt racing! Navigate obstacle-filled tracks with flips and precise control.

name: MotoX3M 3
gamedesc: Third installment with new tracks! More creative obstacles and adrenaline-pumping stunts.

name: MotoX3M
gamedesc: Original motorcycle stunt racer! Explosive courses, death-defying stunts, and time trials.

name: Poly Track New
gamedesc: Race on colorful low-poly tracks! Drift, jump, and speed through vibrant stylized courses.

name: Poly Track Modded
gamedesc: Modified Poly Track with custom tracks and enhanced features! New cars and abilities.

name: Poly Track Old
gamedesc: Classic Poly Track! Original low-poly racing with nostalgic gameplay.

name: Portal Flash
gamedesc: 2D Portal adaptation! Use portals to solve physics puzzles in test chambers with mind-bending mechanics.

name: Raft Wars
gamedesc: Defend your treasure! Turn-based shooting with strategic angles. Upgrade weapons and recruit crew.

name: Raft Wars 2
gamedesc: Continue defending treasure with new enemies and locations! Enhanced turn-based shooting action.

name: Retro Bowl
gamedesc: Manage and play American football! Call plays, pass to receivers, and win championships in retro style.

name: Run 3
gamedesc: Infinite tunnel running! Multiple characters, hundreds of levels, and gravity-defying gameplay.

name: Slope
gamedesc: Race down an infinite slope at breakneck speed! Dodge obstacles in this intensely addictive endless runner.

name: Snow Rider 3D
gamedesc: Sled down snowy mountains! Dodge obstacles, collect presents, and enjoy winter scenery.

name: Submersible
gamedesc: Explore ocean depths in your submarine! Navigate underwater, discover secrets, and manage resources.

name: Super Smash Flash
gamedesc: Fan-made Smash Bros! Platform fighting with characters from multiple franchises.

name: Swords & Souls
gamedesc: Train your warrior and battle in arenas! Mini-games improve stats while you craft equipment and fight.

name: Tanuki Sunset
gamedesc: Skateboard down sunset roads as a rad raccoon! Drift, dodge obstacles, and enjoy vaporwave vibes.

name: There Is No Game
gamedesc: A game insisting there's no game! Break the fourth wall with hilarious meta-puzzles and uncooperative narration.

name: Minecraft Classic Online
gamedesc: Classic Minecraft in browser! Unlimited blocks, creative building, and multiplayer. Original sandbox experience!

name: Eaglercraft
gamedesc: Browser-based Minecraft! Survive, build, and explore with multiplayer support. Full experience in your browser!

name: Chatroom
gamedesc: Connect and chat with players online! Join conversations and make friends in this browser chatroom.

name: Hobo 1
gamedesc: Fight for survival as a hobo! Bizarre combat moves and dark humor in this unconventional beat 'em up.

name: Hobo 2
gamedesc: Prison brawling! Fight guards and inmates with gross special moves in confined spaces.

name: Hobo 3
gamedesc: More bizarre fighting scenarios! Expanded move list with signature crude combat.

name: Hobo 4
gamedesc: Face absurd enemies! More levels, attacks, and outrageous situations.

name: Hobo 5
gamedesc: Space hobo adventure! Crude combat meets alien enemies in outer space.

name: Hobo 6
gamedesc: Continued hobo battles! More abilities and new scenarios with unique humor.

name: Hobo 7
gamedesc: Final hobo chapter! Epic battles and outrageous finishing moves conclude the series.

name: Riddle School 1
gamedesc: Escape from school! Point-and-click puzzles with pixel graphics and clever design.

name: Riddle School 2
gamedesc: Another school escape! More puzzles and locations in continued point-and-click adventure.

name: Riddle School 3
gamedesc: Escape continues! Explore school, interact with characters, and solve clever puzzles.

name: Riddle School 4
gamedesc: More puzzle-solving escapades! Creative challenges and humorous situations.

name: Riddle School 5
gamedesc: Epic series conclusion! Bigger puzzles, deeper story, and ultimate escape adventure.

name: Riddle School Transfer
gamedesc: Spin-off with new protagonist! Same puzzle-solving in different school setting.

name: Riddle School Transfer 2
gamedesc: Transfer storyline continues! More puzzles from different perspective.

name: Sift Heads 1
gamedesc: Professional hitman stick figure! Complete assassination contracts with precision. Series begins!

name: Sift Heads 2
gamedesc: More assassinations! Improved weapons, new targets, enhanced gameplay.

name: Sift Heads 3
gamedesc: Trilogy conclusion! Epic missions, more weapons, cinematic stick figure action.

name: Sift Heads 4
gamedesc: Beyond the trilogy! New storylines and expanded assassination gameplay.

name: Sift Heads 5
gamedesc: Multiple characters and varied missions! Series evolution continues.

name: Deep Sleep 1
gamedesc: Navigate nightmarish dreamscapes! Horror point-and-click with psychological elements and genuine scares.

name: Deep Sleep 2
gamedesc: Deeper into nightmares! More disturbing imagery, harder puzzles, increased tension.

name: Deep Sleep 3
gamedesc: Nightmare trilogy finale! Confront fears and escape deep sleep in atmospheric horror.

name: Dont Escape 1
gamedesc: Lock yourself in! Reverse-escape where you prevent transformation. Unique horror puzzle concept.

name: Dont Escape 2
gamedesc: Zombie survival! Secure shelter before nightfall. Strategic horror with resource management.

name: Dont Escape 3
gamedesc: Space station horror! Investigate mysteries while managing time and resources.

name: Burrito Bison
gamedesc: Launch wrestler through candy land! Bounce off gummy bears with addictive upgrades.

name: Burrito Bison Revenge
gamedesc: Revenge bouncing! More upgrades and gummy bears in enhanced launcher action.

name: Burrito Bison 3
gamedesc: Epic launcher trilogy finale! Multiple characters, new abilities, biggest candy land yet.

name: Zombotron
gamedesc: Fight zombies and robots on alien planet! Physics-based shooting with atmospheric exploration.

name: Zombotron 2
gamedesc: Continue alien zombie adventure! More weapons, bigger levels, enhanced physics.

name: The Impossible Quiz
gamedesc: Impossibly tricky questions! Think outside the box with logic and absurdity. Challenging and funny!

name: The Impossible Quiz 2
gamedesc: More impossible questions! New tricks, harder challenges, same brain-melting formula.

name: Strikeforce Kitty 2
gamedesc: Cat squad runner! Collect costumes for abilities, defeat enemies, rescue princess.

name: Strikeforce Kitty
gamedesc: Original kitten rescue! Build team, equip costumes, run through enemies with RPG progression.

name: Strikeforce Heroes
gamedesc: Side-scrolling shooter with RPG! Choose classes, unlock weapons, deep customization.

name: Stealing the Diamond
gamedesc: Henry Stickmin heist! Choose methods to steal diamond with hilarious outcomes.

name: Papas Wingeria
gamedesc: Run chicken wing restaurant! Take orders, fry wings, serve customers quickly.

name: Papas Pancakeria
gamedesc: Flip pancakes for hungry customers! Cook perfectly and add toppings in breakfast service.

name: Papas Pasteria
gamedesc: Cook pasta dishes! Boil, add sauce, serve with sides in Italian time-management.

name: Papa Louie 1
gamedesc: First platforming adventure! Battle food monsters and rescue customers.

name: Papa Louie 2
gamedesc: Burger attack! Multiple characters with unique abilities and RPG elements.

name: The Binding of Isaac
gamedesc: Dark roguelike shooter! Random dungeons, bizarre items, disturbing enemies. Deep and endlessly replayable!

name: Papas Scooperia
gamedesc: Ice cream parlor! Scoop and create perfect sundaes in sweet time-management.

name: Bloons Tower Defence 2
gamedesc: Classic Bloons TD sequel! More towers, upgrades, and balloon types.

name: Bloons Tower Defence 3
gamedesc: Even more monkeys and bloons! Special agents, new tracks, deeper strategy.

name: Bloons Tower Defence
gamedesc: Original that started the franchise! Simple yet addictive balloon-popping tower defense.

name: Troll Face Quest
gamedesc: Ridiculous puzzles! Think absurdly, embrace meme humor, get trolled!

name: Troll Face Quest 2
gamedesc: More trolling! New scenarios, harder challenges, same absurd humor.

name: Troll Face Quest 3
gamedesc: Trolling continues! Pop culture references and outrageous solutions.

name: Troll Face Quest 4
gamedesc: Get trolled again! Fourth installment with signature absurdist humor.

name: Troll Face Quest 5
gamedesc: Final trollish puzzles! Most ridiculous challenges in series conclusion.

name: This Is The Only Level
gamedesc: Same level, 30 different ways! Each replay changes rules creatively with humor.

name: Territory War
gamedesc: Turn-based stick warfare! Control squad, use weapons strategically, physics-based combat.

name: Super Meat Boy
gamedesc: Brutally difficult precision platformer! Instant death, instant respawn, pixel-perfect challenges.

name: Storm The House
gamedesc: Defend house from attackers! Shoot enemies, upgrade weapons, addictive defense progression.

name: Storm The House 2
gamedesc: Enhanced defense! Better graphics, more weapons, improved mechanics against overwhelming odds.

name: Stick War 1
gamedesc: RTS with stick figures! Mine resources, build units, conquer nations with deep strategy.

name: Stick War 2
gamedesc: Order vs Chaos! New units, abilities, campaign with refined stick figure strategy.

gamedesc: Live stick figure life! Work jobs, level stats, make money in open-ended RPG.

name: Stick Madness
gamedesc: Fast stick combat! Brutal melee and ranged attacks with visceral action.

name: Stick Madness 2
gamedesc: More intense battles! Enhanced combat, new weapons, tougher enemies.

name: Stick Empires
gamedesc: Massive multiplayer stick RTS! Build armies, research tech, battle players with deep strategy.

name: Shopping Cart Hero
gamedesc: Launch yourself in shopping cart! Perform tricks, fly, upgrade cart with addictive gameplay.

name: Shopping Cart Hero 2
gamedesc: Bigger cart jumps! Enhanced launching with new tricks and features.

name: Shopping Cart Hero 3
gamedesc: Ultimate cart trilogy! Maximum jumps, best upgrades, definitive cart launching.

name: Sentry Knight
gamedesc: Lone knight defense! Shoot arrows, use magic, upgrade abilities with RPG progression.

name: Into Space 1
gamedesc: Launch rocket into space! Upgrade ship, reach new heights, explore cosmos.

name: Into Space 2
gamedesc: Continue space exploration! More upgrades, new planets, enhanced rocket launching.

name: Into Space 3
gamedesc: Ultimate space journey! Biggest rockets, furthest distances, most cosmic adventure.

name: qwop
gamedesc: Control individual leg muscles to run! Hilariously difficult track game with physics-based frustration.

name: Pandemic
gamedesc: Evolve a disease to infect the world! Strategic plague spreading with evolution mechanics.

name: Pandemic 2
gamedesc: Enhanced plague evolution! More countries, better mechanics, improved world infection.

name: Madness Project Nexus
gamedesc: Intense stick figure combat! Story mode, arena battles, brutal action in Madness universe.

name: Interactive Buddy
gamedesc: Interact with virtual buddy! Countless items and interactions for creative experimentation.

name: Infiltrating The Airship
gamedesc: Henry Stickmin infiltrates airship! Choose methods with hilarious consequences in choice-driven adventure.

name: Hedgehog Launch
gamedesc: Launch hedgehog to space! Bounce, fly, upgrade equipment in charming launcher game.

name: Fleeing The Complex
gamedesc: Henry Stickmin prison escape! Multiple paths, comedy, and choice consequences.

name: Fat Cat
gamedesc: Feed the hungry cat! Physics-based puzzles to deliver food to chubby feline.

name: Ducklife
gamedesc: Train duck for racing! Run, swim, fly training with charming progression.

name: Ducklife 2
gamedesc: More duck training! Enhanced mini-games and racing challenges.

name: Ducklife 3
gamedesc: Duck evolution! New training modes, genetic selection, expanded racing.

name: Ducklife 4
gamedesc: Train your duck to become a champion racer! Improve abilities through mini-games, compete in races, and explore new areas.

name: Dont Whack Your Boss
gamedesc: Stress relief! Find creative ways to... express frustration. Dark humor office simulation.

name: Dig To China
gamedesc: Dig deep underground! Mine resources, upgrade drill, reach incredible depths.

name: Crush The Castle
gamedesc: Destroy castles with trebuchet! Physics-based destruction with strategic projectile launching.

name: Crush The Castle 2
gamedesc: More castle crushing! New projectiles, bigger castles, enhanced destruction.

name: Clicker Heroes
gamedesc: Click to defeat monsters! Hire heroes, ascend for bonuses, endless idle RPG progression.

name: Canabalt
gamedesc: Endless rooftop running! Jump between buildings in minimalist endless runner that defined the genre.

name: Cactus McCoy 2
gamedesc: Cactus adventure continues! Beat enemies, collect treasures, use various weapons in platforming action.

name: Age Of War
gamedesc: Evolve through ages while defending base! Build units from cavemen to future soldiers.

name: Age Of War 2
gamedesc: Enhanced age evolution! More eras, better graphics, improved strategy defense.

name: Achievement Unlocked
gamedesc: Get achievements for everything! Meta-game about achievements themselves with humor.

name: Achievement Unlocked 2
gamedesc: More achievement madness! Even more ridiculous achievements to unlock.

name: Achievement Unlocked 3
gamedesc: Ultimate achievement game! Final installment with most meta achievements ever.

name: Mini Metro
gamedesc: Build subway system! Connect stations efficiently in minimalist transit puzzle.

name: Awesome Cars
gamedesc: Fast-paced car combat! Race and battle with weapons in vehicular action.

name: Bartender The Right Mix
gamedesc: Mix perfect cocktails! Combine ingredients correctly to satisfy customers in bartending simulation.

name: Bejeweled
gamedesc: Match gems to clear board! Classic match-3 puzzle that defined the genre.

name: Bejeweled 2
gamedesc: Enhanced gem matching! More modes, better graphics, refined classic puzzle.

name: Billards
gamedesc: Classic pool/billiards! Sink balls with realistic physics and strategic shot planning.

name: Bloxorz
gamedesc: Roll block into hole! Mind-bending spatial puzzle with clever level design.

name: Cooking Mama
gamedesc: Cook recipes with Mama! Follow instructions, use timing, create delicious dishes.

name: Crash Bandicoot Flash
gamedesc: Fan-made Crash adventure! Spin, jump, collect fruit in Flash recreation.

name: Doodle Jump
gamedesc: Jump endlessly upward! Tilt and shoot in addictive vertical platformer.

name: Earn to Die
gamedesc: Drive through zombie apocalypse! Upgrade vehicle, smash undead, reach escape.

name: Earn to Die 2
gamedesc: Continue zombie driving! More vehicles, bigger hordes, enhanced smashing.

name: Earn to Die 2 Exodus
gamedesc: Final exodus from zombies! Ultimate vehicles, longest journey, most zombies.

name: Factory Balls
gamedesc: Paint balls to match pattern! Use tools in correct order for logical puzzle.

name: Factory Balls 2
gamedesc: More ball painting puzzles! New tools, harder patterns, expanded logic challenges.

name: Factory Balls 3
gamedesc: Third ball factory! Even more complex patterns and creative solutions.

name: Factory Balls 4
gamedesc: Ultimate factory puzzles! Most challenging patterns in definitive installment.

name: Fancy Pants Adventures
gamedesc: Fluid stick figure platforming! Run, slide, jump through hand-drawn worlds with style.

name: Fancy Pants Adventures 2
gamedesc: More fancy adventures! Expanded levels, new moves, continued fluid animation.

name: Fancy Pants Adventures 3
gamedesc: Biggest fancy adventure! Most content, best animation, ultimate stick platformer.

name: Fireboy and Watergirl
gamedesc: Cooperative puzzle platformer! Control elemental characters together to solve temple challenges.

name: Fireboy and Watergirl 2
gamedesc: Light Temple adventure! Mirrors, beams, and teamwork in elemental puzzle sequel.

name: Fireboy and Watergirl 3
gamedesc: Ice Temple exploration! Slippery surfaces and frozen challenges in cooperative puzzle.

name: Flash Flight Simulator
gamedesc: Realistic aircraft control! Authentic physics, takeoffs, landings, and missions.

name: Gunblood
gamedesc: Wild West quick-draw duels! Speed and accuracy in classic standoff shooting.

name: Johnny Upgrade
gamedesc: Start with nothing, upgrade everything! Unique platformer with progressive ability purchases.

name: Mutilate a Doll 2
gamedesc: Physics sandbox destruction! Spawn ragdolls, use weapons, experiment with realistic physics.

name: Pico vs Uberkids
gamedesc: Pico battles Uberkids! Fast action shooting from Newgrounds creator Tom Fulp.

name: Picos School
gamedesc: Legendary Newgrounds classic! Point-and-click adventure with dark humor and multiple endings.

name: Picos School 2
gamedesc: Pico's adventure continues! More action, new threats, expanded storyline.

name: Red Ball
gamedesc: Roll and jump through levels! Physics-based platforming with charming red ball.

name: Red Ball 2
gamedesc: Red ball returns! New levels, fresh challenges, same fun physics.

name: Red Ball 3
gamedesc: More rolling fun! New environments, tougher puzzles, refined gameplay.

name: Red Ball 4
gamedesc: Save world from evil squares! Most polished entry with best graphics and level design.

name: Road of the Dead
gamedesc: Drive through zombie apocalypse! Plow zombies, shoot from window, escape quarantine.

name: Road of the Dead 2
gamedesc: Zombie highway sequel! Bigger hordes, more vehicles, enhanced action.

name: Run
gamedesc: Defy gravity in space tunnel! Rotate world, avoid gaps, endless running challenge.

name: Run 2
gamedesc: Gravity-defying sequel! Multiple characters, complex tunnels, enhanced wall-running.

name: Run 3
gamedesc: Infinite tunnel running! Multiple characters, hundreds of levels, and gravity-defying gameplay.

name: Sniper Assassin
gamedesc: Professional hitman contracts! Observe carefully, eliminate targets without civilian casualties.

name: Sniper Assassin 2
gamedesc: More sniper missions! New targets, complex scenarios, detective work and sharpshooting.

name: Sniper Assassin 3
gamedesc: Trilogy concludes! Most challenging contracts requiring flawless execution.

name: Sniper Assassin 4
gamedesc: Beyond trilogy! Enhanced mechanics, new scenarios, deadly missions.

name: Sniper Assassin 5
gamedesc: Ultimate sniper challenge! Most complex targets, highest stakes, perfect execution required.

name: Toss the Turtle
gamedesc: Launch turtle with cannons and bombs! Explosive launcher with humorous upgrade system.

name: Unfair Mario
gamedesc: Looks like Mario, plays nothing like it! Hidden traps, invisible blocks, rage-inducing parody.

name: Bitlife 2
gamedesc: Virtual life sequel! New scenarios, expanded features, more life paths to explore.

name: Jacksmith
gamedesc: Donkey blacksmith! Forge weapons, send warriors to battle, unique crafting-strategy blend.
